classroom.title: Start Teaching
classroom.tooltip_title: Number of times teaching has started, the proportion of resources used for teaching to total preparation resources

courseware.title: Teaching Resources
courseware.tooltip_title: Total courseware used during online teaching

interaction.title: Classroom Interaction
interaction.tooltip_title: Shows the number of interactive activities used after the start of class, including selection (random/personal selection, group selection, passing the flower, random ranking), quick response (answer/task), raise hand

courseware_distribution.title: Classroom Activity Resources
courseware_distribution.tooltip_title: The proportion of various resources in the courseware used in the classroom

interaction_distribution.title: Classroom Interaction Distribution
interaction_distribution.tooltip_title: The proportion of various interactions in the interactions initiated in the classroom

resource_distribution.title: Course Resources
resource_distribution.tooltip_title: The proportion of various types of resources in the course content

task_distribution.title: Course Tasks
task_distribution.tooltip_title: The proportion of various types of tasks in the course
